---
id: move-context
title: "MoveContext"
description: "Updates the condition of the mentioned context, if a context with the new condition already exists, it merges the override and effectively deleting the old context"

hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: docs/api/superposition
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"MoveContext"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/context/move/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the condition of the mentioned context, if a context with the new condition already exists, it merges the override and effectively deleting the old context

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"juspay"},"required":true},{"name":"x-tenant","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"context":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Represents conditional criteria used for context matching. Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.","title":"Condition"},"description":{"type":"string"},"change_reason":{"type":"string"}},"required":["change_reason","context"],"title":"MoveContextRequestContent"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"MoveContext 200 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Represents conditional criteria used for context matching. Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.","title":"Condition"},"override":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Configuration overrides that replace default values when context conditions are met. Keys represent configuration keys and values are the override data.","title":"Overrides"},"override_id":{"type":"string"},"weight":{"type":"string","description":"Priority weight used to determine the order of context evaluation. Higher weights take precedence during configuration resolution."},"description":{"type":"string"},"change_reason":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"created_by":{"type":"string"},"last_modified_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"last_modified_by":{"type":"string"}},"required":["id"],"title":"MoveContextResponseContent"}}}},"404":{"description":"ResourceNotFound 404 response"},"500":{"description":"InternalServerError 500 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"InternalServerErrorResponseContent"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
